wikipedia.title: Anabolic steroid
wikipedia.summary: Anabolic steroids, also known more properly as anabolic-androgenic steroids (AAS), are steroidal androgens that include natural androgens like testosterone as well as synthetic substances that are structurally related and have similar effects to testostero
